description: This file defines the EventNativeCodeProducer class, which is responsible for generating native C code (headers and source files) related to events and event adapters for a specific service. It uses templates and context information to output code that handles event definitions, encoding/decoding, and callback registration for native implementations.

classes.name: EventNativeCodeProducer
classes.description: A class responsible for generating native C code (headers and source files) for events, including definitions, encoding/decoding, and adapters, based on templates and context information for a specific service.

methods.name: generate
methods.description: Main method to generate all event-related native code (headers and source files) for a specific context and language mask.

methods.name: generateWrapperFile
methods.description: Indicates whether it's applicable to generate a wrapper file; here, always returns false as not applicable.

methods.name: generateWrapperBuffer
methods.description: Generates a wrapper buffer if applicable; here, always returns null as not applicable.
